entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 06:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 in the morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
